meanings.definition: A microscopic channel that allows for communication and transport between plant cells.
meanings.sent1: The plasmodesmata in the plant cells help them share important messages.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study how plasmodesmata facilitate cell-to-cell communication in plants.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous plant cells played a game of telephone using plasmodesmata.
meanings.sent4: The plasmodesmata acted as tiny highways connecting the plant cells.
meanings.sent5: Imagine plasmodesmata as tiny tunnels linking the plant cells together.
